H0.text: Blue eyes are not an inherited trait in humans.

H1.text: Long fingers are not an inherited trait in humans.

H2.text: Calloused hands are not an inherited trait in humans.

H3.text: Attached earlobes are not an inherited trait in humans.

A4.text: Earlobes do not all fall neatly into either category; there is a continuous range from one extreme to the other, suggesting the influence of several genes.

A5.text: Eye color is an inherited trait determined by multiple genes.

A6.text: An individual might inherit the 'brown-eye trait' from one of the parents.
